#summary This page outlines the development punchlist and notes related to Locations.

----

==Add==
_Fields:_
 * Name

----

==Edit==
_Fields:_
 * Name

----

==Delete==
This page should check for existing [Departments] mapped to this Location, and display an error if some exist, along with a link to the appropriate mapped [Departments].
`You cannot delete this Location until <a href='whatever'>this Department</a> is mapped to another Location.`

----

==List==
If the user is a [Users#Super_Admin Super Admin], display a list of all Locations. Else, if the user is a [Users#Location_Admin Location Admin] of one or more Locations, display a list of all appropriate Locations. Else, display a list of Locations based on the user's mapped [Departments].

_Links:_
Each list item should link to the appropriate [Departments#List Department List].

----

==View==
The view page for Locations should display counts of mapped [Users], [Users#LocationAdmin LocationAdmins], and [Assets], as well as a summary of [Assets asset] values.
